law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Administration may design temporary regist...

text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Administration may design temporary registration plates and furnish them to any licensed dealer who:
On the form that the Administration requires, applies for at least five of these plates; and
With the application, submits a fee established by the Administration for each plate.
A wholesale dealer may not apply for temporary registration plates.
